item.title: Imperial’s First Student Think Tank to Launch this year
item.author: jjg13,
item.description: Christened the London Forum for Science and Policy (LFSP) and launching this year, Imperial’s first student think tank carefully sidesteps the university’s trap of a neocolonial-sounding name. At a time when policymakers are increasingly criticised for their poor use of evidence, LFSP will infuse …
